name: Robotrash Energy
description:
Robotrash Energy

Pickup trash with your trusty vacuum cleaner and shoot it to the garbage truck. Just keep an eye on your energy levels!

Controls:

  • [WASD] to move.
  • [Space] to vacuum the trash. Bigger trash takes longer to vacuum.
  • [F] to shoot the collected trash. Aim to the truck!
  • [E] to attach/detach the energy charging cable.
  • [Escape] to close the game.

Note: you can also use right click to shoot and left click to vacuum.

Developed for GMTK 2021 by:

  • Javier Sepúlveda
  • Arturo Rodríguez Romero

Some sound effects by https://kenney.nl/

Some sound effects by https://www.musicbed.com/artists/generdyn/40278

Some sound effects by https://www.mgfaudio.com/

Some sound effects by https://freesound.org/people/humanoide9000/

Music: “Men-in-blues”, by Eino Toivanen, kongano.com Licenced under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 creativecommons.org/licences/by/4.0
